meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.5
meta.summary: This version is a minor bug fix release addressing issues found in Vert.x 3.8.4. We would like to thank you all for reporting these issues.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 milestone 4 released!
meta.summary: The new milestone of Vert.x 4 makes progress in futurisation and includes improvements on the mail client, general clients, and security.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.4
meta.summary: This version is a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.8.3, which addresses quite a few bugs reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.3
meta.summary: This new version is a minor bug fix release that addresses issues reported in Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.2. We would like to thank you all for reporting these bugs.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.2
meta.summary: This version is a bug fix release of Vert.x 3.8.3, which addresses quite a few bugs reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 milestone 3 released!
meta.summary: The next milestone release of Vert.x 4 aims to provide a reliable distribution of the current development for people who want to try it and provide feedback.
